**cohost does this on its own now so there's no need for this userscript anymore**

[![view on github](https://img.shields.io/badge/view%20on%20github-272b33?logo=github)](https://github.com/adrianmgg/userscripts/tree/main/cohost.org/descriptive_page_titles) [![download on greasyfork](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=%23900&label=download%20on%20greasyfork&query=total_installs&suffix=%20downloads&url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fen%2Fscripts%2F448652-cohost-descriptive-page-titles.json&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/448652-cohost-descriptive-page-titles)

adds descriptive, dynamically updating titles to cohost pages, replacing the default "cohost!" for everything
